formulas.name: AccountcreationDescription
formulas.expression: "Account Name: " + {!NewSalesOpscaseAccountNAme} + BR()+ "Account Record Type: " + {!NewSalesOpscaseAccount_Record_Type} + BR()+ "Industry: " + {!NewSalesOpsCaseIndustry} + BR()+ "Billing Address: " + {!NewSalesOpscaseBilling_Address} + BR()+ "Account Currency: " + {!Account_Currency}+ BR()+ "Legal Entity Name: " + {!NewSalesOpsCaseLegal_Entity_Name} + BR()+ "Phone: " + {!NewSalesOpsCasePhone} + BR()+ "Website: "+ "" + BR()+ " # Of Employees (Non SLG): " +{!NewSalesopsCaseOf_Employees_Non_SLG} + BR()+ "Population Served (SLG): " + {!NewSalesopscasePopulation_Served_SLG}

formulas.name: NewSalesopsCaseSubtype
formulas.expression: IF({!NewSalesopscaseType}="Territory Management", {!NewSalesopscaseSubtypeTerritoryManagement}, IF({!NewSalesopscaseType}="Comp", {!NewSalesopscaseSubtypeComp}, IF({!NewSalesopscaseType}="Opportunity", {!NewSalesopscaseSubtypeOpportunity}, IF({!NewSalesopscaseType}="Data Quality", {!NewSalesopscaseSubtypedataQuality}, IF({!NewSalesopscaseType}="Reporting", {!NewSalesopscaseSubtypReporting}, "" )))))

formulas.name: ProposedOffer
formulas.expression: IF( {!SalesopsCaseType}="Quotes / Open Opportunities", {!SalesopscaseSubtypeQuotesOpenOpportunities}, IF( {!SalesopsCaseType}="CLM Assistance", {!SalesopscaseSubtypeQuotesCLMAssistance}, IF( {!SalesopsCaseType}="Order Processing/Closed Opportunities", {!SalesopscaseSubtypeorderprocessingclosedopp}, "")) )

formulas.name: SalesforceCasePriority
formulas.expression: IF( OR( AND({!SalesforceCaseType}="Error Received",{!SalesforceCaseSubtypeErrorRecived}="Opportunity"), AND( {!SalesforceCaseType}="Error Received",{!SalesforceCaseSubtypeErrorRecived}="Quote") ), "Level 2 - High", "Level 3 - Medium")

formulas.name: SalesforceCaseSalesforceSupportCategory
SalesforceCaseSubCategory
formulas.expression:
IF( {!SalesforceCaseType} = "Error Received", {!SalesforceCaseSubtypeErrorRecived} , IF( {!SalesforceCaseType} = "Tech Stack Support", {!SalesforceCaseSubtypeTechStackSupport} , IF( {!SalesforceCaseType} = "SFDC Assistance", {!SalesforcecaseSubtypeSFDCAssistance} , "")
))

formulas.name: SOC4
formulas.expression: "Help with co-terming growth and upgrades and credit calculations"

formulas.name: SOC7
formulas.expression: "Deal review prior to moving opportunity to stage 6 (closed won)"
